102-1 Name of the organization Marriott International, Inc. (“Marriott”) 2017 Annual Report and 10-K Filing
102-2 Activities, brands, products  
and servicesMarriott is a worldwide operator, franchisor, and licensor of hotels and timeshare properties under  
numerous brand names at different price and service points. 
Consistent with our focus on management, franchising, and licensing, we own very few of our  
lodging properties. We also operate, market, and develop residential properties and provide services  
to home/condominium owner associations.
We offer two overall styles of hotels — Classic and Distinctive — each of which we group into three  
quality tiers: Luxury, Premium, and Select:
